title: Levkovich looks at factors weighing on stocks.
summary: In an interview on Fox Business, Citi's Chief US Equity Strategist Tobias Levkovich discusses market volatility and concerns over a summer slowdown.
tag-1: Levkovich looks at factors weighing on stocks.
tag-2: In an interview on Fox Business, Citi's Chief US Equity Strategist Tobias Levkovich discusses market volatility and concerns over a summer slowdown.
